adrFormatAddress: 387 Park Ave S 7th Floor, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I have not moved in the building just yet, but I’m very excited about moving in based on the experience I got dealing with management alone . Nikita & Yajaira are very attentive . If I emailed them , they responded immediately. It made me feel like I was there only client. When I went in the management office every one was really nice . Nikita had a big smile on her face and was very sweet and informative, it gave me warm at home feeling. The women that showed me my apt was also very nice. I love it already .

originalText.text: If you are black forget about any TFC building they will confuse you only to tell you that you were Denied. Then after say that you can’t apply to any of their buildings because you don’t meet their criteria. Even if you make 40-80x, show tax returns, paystubs etc they don’t care!!! they will deny you!! Maybe use a  person that’s not black to apply for you so that you can qualify. Overall worst experience I’ve ever had in nyc searching for apartments!

originalText.text: Current tenant of their Hudson Yards building. Management breaks the law, enters your apartment without consent, steals your keys, and does not respond via phone or email at the end of the day - honestly outrageous that they're still in business. Elsa Hysa in the management office and Hristo Nikolov (building manager) are particularly incompetent / awful to deal with. If you're a prospective tenant, would def run as far as you can haha

originalText.text: If you like non stop construction, smelling pot 24/7, management of TF Cornerstone who couldn't care about anything other than charging you 4,500 to live in a cesspool, then this is your ideal rental company. If that doesn't sound ideal, RUN and don't look back. Don't say you weren't warned.

If that doesn't sound ideal, RUN and don't look back. Don't say you weren't warned.

originalText.text:
I lived there for year and a half and had a lot of issues!

First, they charged me for an extra month of rent and said that they would pay it back by check, however its been more than 7 weeks since that and I still haven’t received anything. The Management office is rude, irresponsive, unkind and poor in communications, and honestly cannot and will not answer emails promptly.

Also, when I first moved in January, Management had already scheduled (a couple of months before) facade works and to block all the balconies, but did not disclose that information beforehand. I could not use my balcony for almost 6 months and they were unwilling to reduce my rent.

The only good thing about this building is that they have stabilized rent and the people that work in the front desk are very nice.
